file_insights..auto-claude-status: Contains project execution state tracking with active spec, subtask progress, and session information
file_insights..auto-claude/specs/015-reliability-score: Tracks implementation plan status and execution progress for reliability score calculation feature

patterns_discovered.status_tracking: Project maintains consistent status tracking across multiple files with timestamps and progress indicators
patterns_discovered.spec_based_execution: Work organized around numbered specifications with clear task boundaries
patterns_discovered.session_management: Session tracking with numbered sessions and start/end times for execution monitoring

gotchas_discovered.status_consistency: Multiple files need synchronized updates to maintain consistent project state
gotchas_discovered.timestamp_sensitivity: Update timestamps must be carefully managed across related files

approach_outcome.completed_task: Create reliability_score_history table for tracking score changes over time
approach_outcome.progress_made: Successfully completed first subtask of reliability score calculation specification
approach_outcome.state_update: Project status updated to reflect progress from 8 to 1 completed subtasks (transition between specs)

recommendations.backup_strategy: Consider automated backups of status files before major updates
recommendations.validation: Implement validation checks for consistency between status files
recommendations.automation: Consider automating status file synchronization to prevent inconsistencies
